thread.title: BRIEF-Brazil's Bradesco shareholders to receive 10 pct bonus over March 29 stake- filing

title: BRIEF-Brazil's Bradesco shareholders to receive 10 pct bonus over March 29 stake- filing
text: March 19, 2018 / 12:22 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Brazil's Bradesco shareholders to receive 10 pct bonus over March 29 stake- filing Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Banco Bradesco Sa: * BRAZIL’S BRADESCO SAYS CENTRAL BANK APPROVED 8 BILLION REAIS CAPITAL RAISE- FILING * BRAZIL’S BRADESCO SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE BONUS OF 10 PERCENT OF STAKE HELD IN MARCH 29- FILING * BRAZIL’S BRADESCO SHAREHOLDERS TO RECEIVE ONE SHARE PER 10 SHARES HELD, 10 PERCENT MORE IN DIVIDENDS * NEW BONUS SHARES WILL BE ISSUED ON APRIL 4, AVAILABLE TO CURRENT SHAREHOLDERS ON APRIL 5- FILING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Tatiana Bautzer)
